ETYMOLOGY: From Old English 'flyht' (act of flying, power of flying, act of fleeing), from Proto-Germanic '*flugtiz' (a flying, flight), related to 'fly'.

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: noun: a word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things (common noun), or to name a particular one of these (proper noun).
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: The act of flying through the air or the power of flying.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 在空中飞行的行为或能力。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: The eagle's majestic flight captivated all who watched.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 老鹰雄伟的飞行吸引了所有观看的人。

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: noun: a word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things (common noun), or to name a particular one of these (proper noun).
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: A journey made in an aircraft.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 乘坐飞机进行的旅程或航班。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: Our flight to New York was delayed due to bad weather.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 我们飞往纽约的航班因恶劣天气而延误了。

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: noun: a word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things (common noun), or to name a particular one of these (proper noun).
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: A group of birds or insects flying together. Also, a series of steps (stairs) or a set of arrows.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 一群一起飞行的鸟或昆虫；也可指一段楼梯或一组箭。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: A flight of pigeons landed on the roof.

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: noun: a word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things (common noun), or to name a particular one of these (proper noun).
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: The action of running away or escaping.
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: The sudden noise caused the animals to take flight.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 突如其来的噪音使动物们四散而逃。

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: noun: a word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things (common noun), or to name a particular one of these (proper noun).
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: A selection of small servings of alcoholic beverages (e.g., wine, beer) presented together for tasting.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 一组小份的酒精饮料（如葡萄酒、啤酒），一起呈现供品尝。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: We ordered a flight of local craft beers to sample.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 我们点了一组当地精酿啤酒来品尝。

REGISTER: General usage, common in everyday conversation and writing across various contexts.
